tr.title: HakkÄ±mÄ±zda
tr.content:
Poyraz Kafe olarak, PoyrazkÃ¶y'Ã¼n eÅŸsiz deniz manzarasÄ± eÅŸliÄŸinde misafirlerimize en kaliteli kahve deneyimini sunuyoruz. 2018'den bu yana, taze Ã§ekilmiÅŸ kahvelerimiz, ev yapÄ±mÄ± lezzetlerimiz ve sÄ±cak atmosferimizle Ä°stanbul'un gizli cennetinde hizmet veriyoruz.

BoÄŸaz'Ä±n serinliÄŸi ile kahvenin sÄ±caklÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± birleÅŸtirerek, her fincanda bir hikaye sunuyoruz. Sabah kahvaltÄ±larÄ±ndan akÅŸam tatlÄ±larÄ±na, her anÄ±nÄ±zÄ± Ã¶zel kÄ±lmak iÃ§in buradayÄ±z.

en.title: About Us
en.content:
As Poyraz Cafe, we offer our guests the highest quality coffee experience accompanied by the unique sea view of PoyrazkÃ¶y. Since 2018, we have been serving in Istanbul's hidden paradise with our freshly ground coffees, homemade delicacies and warm atmosphere.

By combining the freshness of the Bosphorus with the warmth of coffee, we present a story in every cup. From breakfast to evening desserts, we are here to make every moment special.
